document_data.mainbody:
aider Grath was one of the githyanki who guarded Crèche Ylleks the hatchery on Toril in the late 15 century DR.
Grath had typical skin and spot coloration of her kin. She had high brown hair and had painted or tattooed eyes and eyebrows. She wore almost no armor, apart from a pauldron and bracers of githyanki design. As a Raider, Grath was armed with a heavy crossbow.
Raider Grath, along with other gith of what would become Crèche Yllek, attacked and claimed the Rosymorn Monastery of Lathander in the Western Heartlands sometime before the . Soon after, the function of Crèche was changed as the githyanki war against the mind flayers in Faerûn shifted in balance. During that time, Grath was placed to stand guard in the Crèches hatchery and its youths caretaker Varsh Kokuu. Raider Grath showed disdain for any non-gith istik if they were allowed access to Crèche Yllek.
